Name: FOV
Description: Distance from mouse in which targets will be accounted for.

Name: TeamCheck
Description: Whether to check if the target is on an opposing team.

Name: WallCheck
Description: Whether to check if the target is behind a wall.

Name: Auto-Fire
Description: Whether to click LMB when the aimbot is over the target.

Name: Hitscan
Description: Whether to check other bodyparts when it selects a target.

Name: Auto-Stop
Description: Whether to stop the character when a target is acquired.

Name: DrawFOV
Description: Whether to draw a circle that represents the current FOV.

Name: ForceFieldCheck
Description: Whether to check if the target has a ForceField.
